caption:
The photograph depicts an elderly man standing outdoors in a rural setting. He is located on the right side of the frame and wearing a tan fedora hat and glasses. He has a smile and squints slightly, which implies it's sunny. The man is dressed in a maroon sweater and a yellow shirt underneath.

The background reveals a vast agricultural field, lush and green, likely in early stages of growth. This field stretches to the background under a clear sky with few clouds. In the mid-background, there are a few farm buildings; a barn and other smaller outbuildings are visible. The immediate terrain near the man is muddy, showing patches of water, suggesting recent rain or irrigation.

The overall atmosphere of the photograph conveys a peaceful rural life, possibly on a farm, with elements underlining agricultural productivity and natural beauty. The man's attire and the location suggest he may be involved in farming or closely related activities.
title: David frazer, 87, a leading citizen of utica
